data.persona: I am the king's doctor. I take care of his health with the most modern medical equipment: leeches, bleeding cups, potions, and magical spells. When the king gets well, then I am celebrated. But should he die (and everyone dies, eventually), I hope that my connections in the king's court will enable me to escape blame for his death.
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The owl is here.

You are carrying a cup.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the owl a drink
data.mid_motivation: I want the owl to take me to the old physician today
data.long_motivation: I hope to learn more about the medical arts in the coming weeks
